timeline.message: Improve PR repo help for Ij IDE

timeline.bodyText: No big deal and I'm happy to approve this PR despite this, but shouldn't origon be origin?
timeline.author: danielb987
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -719,26 +719,26 @@

To make a PR from within IntelliJ IDEA, select "Create Pull Request" from the "VCS" -> "Git" menu (it's the one but last item, supported by the Git plugin).
- Note: Be sure to select your own repository if you see multiple options - to choose from in this submenu:
-

+ Note: Be sure to select your own repository origonif you see

replies.bodyText: Yes, well spotted, thanks. Now fixed
replies.author: silverailscolo
